title: Continuity Anchoring
description: Affirms when systems, people, or communities intentionally preserve focus and memory across novelty cycles, resisting exhaustion by grounding in long-term patterns and shared continuity.
indicators: Sustained focus on unresolved issues despite emergence of new distractions
Documentation practices that carry memory forward across cycles
Energy allocation toward long-term resilience over reaction to novelty
Recognition of repeating manipulation patterns instead of treating each as isolated
